parameter.name: X_ADB_ConnectionRequestPort
parameter.description: The TCP Port on which the CPE is listening for Connection Requests. When set, this parameter will update {{param|ConnectionRequestURL}} accordingly.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ConnectionRequestPath
parameter.description: The path part of the Connection Request URL. When set, this parameter will update {{param|ConnectionRequestURL}} accordingly.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ConnectionRequestRandomPath
parameter.description: If {{true}}, the CPE generates a random suffix appended to the connection request URL.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ConnectionRequestInterface
parameter.description: The IP interface on which the CPE is listening for Connection Requests Setting this parameter, the {{param|ConnectionRequestURL}} is updated accordingly.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ConnectionRequestInterval
parameter.description: When {{param}} is greater than 0, the CPE restricts the number of Connection Requests that it accepts during the given period of time in {{units}}, in order to reduce the possibility of a denial of service attack. After a successful Connection Request, any further attempt received within this period is rejected with HTTP status code 503 (Service Unavailable). When this value is 0, there's not such limit.

parameter.name: X_ADB_InformInterface
parameter.description: When specified, the CPE binds to the given interface for outgoing CWMP traffic. The ACS can be reached only through routing rules defined for the given IP interface. When this parameter is {{empty}}, the CPE opens CWMP connections according to the normal routing rules, which is the standard behavior.

parameter.name: X_ADB_IPv6Preferred
parameter.description: If {{true}}, the CPE will bind to the first enabled IPv6 address assigned to the IP Interface specified by {{param|X_ADB_ConnectionRequestInterface}}, if available. Otherwise, IPv4 addresses will be used.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TLSVersion
X_ADB_TLSCheck
parameter.description: When the HTTPS protocol is used to connect to the ACS, this parameter indicates which validity checks must be performed on TLS certificate.

parameter.name: X_ADB_IdleTimeout
parameter.description: The maximum time in {{units}} the agent will wait for the next message from the ACS during a CWMP session. When this time elapses, the agent closes the session.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DelaySecondsTimeWindow
parameter.description: The maximum time in {{units}} the CPE must attempt to perform a scheduled RPC after the configured delay seconds are expired. When this time elapses, the CPE must consider the RPC to have failed and report this failure to the ACS.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ResolvedACSAddress
parameter.description: The IP addresses resolved from parameter {{param|URL}}.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DownloadIdleTimeout
parameter.description: The maximum time in {{units}} the agent will wait for an idle download session. When this time elapses, the agent closes the download session with failure.

parameter.name: X_ADB_NotificationDelay
parameter.description: The time to wait in {{units}} after a change event before the corresponding Inform notification is sent to the ACS, in order to aggregate other possible events that may happen in this time interval.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TimeSynchWait
parameter.description: The maximum time in {{units}} the agent will wait for network time synchronization before sending Inform events. The wait timer starts on WAN management connection ready. If set to 0, the agent will wait for synchronization indefinitely. This is applied only when network time service is enabled, see the {{object|.Time}} object.

object.name: ManagementServer.X_ADB_CWMPState.
object.description: Parameters reporting the internal status of the CWMP agent.

parameter.name: SessionInProgress
parameter.description: The value of this parameter is {{true}} while a CWMP session is running, {{false}} otherwise.

parameter.name: LastInformTime
parameter.description: Date and time in UTC of the last Inform successfully sent to the ACS.

parameter.name: LastCRInformTime
parameter.description: Date and time in UTC of the last CONNECTION REQUEST Inform successfully sent to the ACS.

parameter.name: LastVCInformTime
parameter.description: Date and time in UTC of the last VALUE CHANGE Inform successfully sent to the ACS.

parameter.name: LastPeriodicInformTime
parameter.description: Date and time in UTC of the last PERIODIC Inform successfully sent to the ACS.

parameter.name: LastSessionEndTime
parameter.description: Date and time in UTC when the last session with the ACS has completed.

parameter.name: ValueChangeNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: PostProvisioningNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: DiagnosticsNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: ManagementServer.X_ADB_CWMPState.ValueChange.{i}.
object.description: This table lists all parameters for which a VALUE CHANGE notification must be sent to the ACS.

parameter.name: Parameter
parameter.description: The full path of the parameter.

object.name: ManagementServer.X_ADB_CWMPState.PostProvisioning.{i}.
object.description: This table lists all operations postponed at the end of the current CWMP session.

parameter.name: Parameter
parameter.description: The full path of the parameter to be set.

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: The value to set.

parameter.name: Priority
parameter.description: Priority class assigned to the entry. {{enum}}

object.name: ManagementServer.X_ADB_CWMPState.Diagnostics.{i}.
object.description: This table lists all diagnostics tasks for which a DIAGNOSTICS COMPLETE notification must be sent to the ACS.

parameter.name: Parameter
parameter.description: The full path of the DiagnosticsState parameter.

parameter.name: DiagnosticsState
parameter.description: The value of the DiagnosticsState parameter.
